abstract: Yahoo has released a rosy outlook for the next two years, hoping to give investors a better understanding of why the company is not willing to sell itself to Microsoft for less than $45 billion.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo has released a rosy outlook for the next two years, hoping to give investors a better understanding of why the company is not willing to sell itself to Microsoft for less than $45 billion.

headline.main: Yahoo Decides to Release a Rosy Forecast
